items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
The Louvre × Yu Nagaba

In the partnership which began with the Louvre in 2021, UNIQLO supports educational programs in the museum and releases collaborative products on an ongoing basis. For this new collection, selecting from among more than 35,000 pieces, artist Yu Nagaba has created special artwork of masterpieces such as Da Vinci's "Mona Lisa" and Vermeer's "Astronomer".

Yu Nagaba
Artist. Known for his works drawn with simple lines, he is active in various fields such as magazines, books, advertisements, and collaborations with apparel brands, in addition to his activities as an artist.

Inspired by Mona Lisa – Portrait of Lisa Gherardini, wife of Francesco del Giocondo / Leonardo DA VINCI / 1503-1519
© Musée du Louvre
©2022 Yu Nagaba
items.name: The Louvre UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: The Louvre’s masterpieces drawn by Japan’s contemporary artist Yu Nagaba are now available from UT!

items.longDescription:
BLUE NOTE RECORDS

Blue Note Records, a label specializing in jazz, has been delighting music lovers all over the world since its launch in New York in 1939. Extremely famous records that have carved out their place in jazz history have returned to the UT collection.

©Courtesy of Blue Note Records, under license from Universal Music Enterprises, a division of UMG Recordings, Inc.
items.name: Blue Note Records UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Famous records representing the world of jazz have been picked up from the legendary jazz music label, Blue Note Records.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Keith Haring 1st Exhibition

On view from October 9 - November 13,1982, at the Tony Shafrazi Gallery in NYC, Keith Haring's first major exhibition was energetic and it propelled him onto the main stage of the New York art scene. The opening was packed from wall to wall and artists, art critics, art dealers, friends, and young kids, all mingling and have fun!

Keith Haring
A key figure in New York’s East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Haring’s artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the city’s subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling “radiant baby,” with abstract marks and patterning.

© Keith Haring Foundation. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
items.name: Keith Haring UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Keith Haring's first exhibition artworks in the UT collection.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
The Louvre × Yu Nagaba

In the partnership which began with the Louvre in 2021, UNIQLO supports educational programs in the museum and releases collaborative products on an ongoing basis. For this new collection, selecting from among more than 35,000 pieces, artist Yu Nagaba has created special artwork of masterpieces such as Da Vinci's "Mona Lisa" and Vermeer's "Astronomer".

Yu Nagaba
Artist. Known for his works drawn with simple lines, he is active in various fields such as magazines, books, advertisements, and collaborations with apparel brands, in addition to his activities as an artist.

Inspired by: Mona Lisa / Leonardo DA VINCI
Aphrodite, known as the "Vénus de Milo"
The Winged Victory of Samothrace
La Grande Odalisque / Jean-Auguste-Dominique INGRES
La Belle Jardinière / Raffaello SANTI, known as Raphael
The Astronomer / Johannes VERMEER
The Great Sphinx of Tanis
Louvre Pyramid © I.M. Pei
©2022 Yu Nagaba
items.name: The Louvre UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: The Louvre’s masterpieces drawn by Japan’s contemporary artist Yu Nagaba are now available from UT!

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Pokémon Meets Artist SS22

Since its creation in 1996, Pokémon has been loved by people worldwide. This collection features the participation of “magma,” a new artist duo attracting attention worldwide. Their creativity has produced a collection full of new Pokémon charm and appeal!

artist unit: magma
An artist unit by Jun Sugiyama and Kenichi Miyazawa. They use their unique outlook to create works with waste materials, resin, and motor appliances, and have expanded into furniture, products, and space direction. They are garnering much attention both domestically and abroad for their vaguely nostalgic works that fuse analogue and crazy colors.

©2022 Pokémon.
©1995-2022 Nintendo/Creatures Inc./GAME FREAK inc.
items.name: Pokemon UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Pokémon as art! A new Pokémon collection created through an encounter with art is coming to UT!

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- 100% rayon fabric with an elegant drape.
- Roomy fit in the shoulders and sleeves.
- Featuring water and wave patterns from woodblock prints by early twentieth-century artist and designer Kamisaka Sekka.
- Kamisaka Sekka is considered the last great master of the Rinpa school of Japanese painting, which sought to find beauty in everyday life.
- A relaxed Aloha shirt.
- From our collaboration with Unsodo, a publisher of traditional Japanese books made with hand-printed woodblock prints since the 19th century.
- According to some sources, the first Aloha shirts were made by migrants from Japan to Hawaii who remade old kimono into shirts.
- This genuine Japanese print is a perfect match with the Aloha shirt.
items.name: MEN Unsodo Short Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: Inspired by the iconic designs of Kamisaka Sekka. Relaxed cut for a laid-back style.

items.longDescription:
- Supple, smooth pinpoint Oxford fabric made from premium fine count yarn.
- Specially processed to add shape-retaining properties without sacrificing the natural feel of 100% cotton.
- Manufactured under strict control, from fabric production to sewing.
- The fabric is kept refrigerated until the sewing process to ensure its shape-retaining properties.
- This non-iron shirt has a special dipping finish and tape sewing process, making it shape-retaining and wrinkle-resistant for the ultimate easy care business shirt. Note: Light ironing may be required depending on washing conditions. · Collar height and shape look great with a necktie.
- Balanced chest pocket designed for practicality, just the right size for an ID card or passport.
- Curved armholes for easy movement.
- Slender cut showcases the elegant drape of the fabric.
- Semi-wide collar.
- The glossy, elegant pinpoint Oxford fabric pairs well with all neckties and suits.
